full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 60 of 236 964 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 1 THE COURT: Well, he said he doesn't recall exactly the year, and you impeached on the earlier one. 2 MR. PAGLIUCA: Yesterday, he said it was 1994, and this is impeaching that testimony as well. 3 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, if I may on that point, I 4 believe the testimony was 1994 or 1995 yesterday, and then 5 today on cross-examination I think he expanded it to between 6 1993 and 1996. I think it's clear in the record that he's not 7 sure exactly what year it was. 8 THE COURT: Yes, I agree with that. 9 MR. PAGLIUCA: Respectfully, I disagree, your Honor. 10 "During those occasions, I observed Mr. Epstein and 11 Ms. Maxwell and her mother talking." 12 We're limiting it to those occasions, and it's not 13 expanding on any of those occasions. Yesterday he testified to 14 multiple occasions, more than three, many more than three. 15 Paragraph 4: "In addition to seeing Jane at 16 Mr. Epstein's home, I was also instructed on one occasion by 17 Mr. Epstein to pick Ms. Jane up from what I presume was her 18 home address in West Palm Beach." 19 He discussed yesterday more than one occasion being 20 instructed to pick her up at West Palm Beach. 21 THE COURT: You can ask him if he recalls saying one 22 occasion. 23 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, if I may, the fact that he 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018161
